thread.title: Avid Puzzler
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Avid Puzzler

author: Avid Puzzler
title: Avid Puzzler
text:
Great selection of puzzles; very good quality.
Have been a loyal White Mountain customer for years. Only reason I gave 4 Stars is that I've noticed recently that the pieces don't stay together as well when trying to move a very small section to another area.
